Title: Troublesome Goblins II
Text:
The goblins have repopulated their cave, far to the west of Glóin's camp along the path through the Misty Mountains..

Glóin told you that if you search the goblins' cave in the Misty Mountains, you should find a goblin named Ulmug. He appears to be their leader, and by defeating him, you should throw the goblins into disarray and perhaps find the trail of the Nazgûl.
CompleteText:
Glóin is at his camp at the east-end of the pass that leads through the Misty Mountains.

In defeating Ulmug, you find him accompanied by hostile Dourhand dwarves. Glóin should be made known of this development
